about_the_game:
Welcome to the Supermarket, the ultimate multiplayer retail experience! Step into the shoes of a supermarket manager and team up with friends—or compete against them—to create, grow, and dominate the world of grocery retail. From humble beginnings as a small convenience store to a sprawling mega-mart empire, the journey is yours to shape.

Whether you’re working as a team to run the most efficient store or engaging in friendly rivalry to out-sell your competition, this Supermarket delivers endless fun and strategic depth. Balance the chaos of customer demands, shelf stocking, and staff management while navigating unpredictable challenges like flash sales, supply chain disruptions, and quirky customer events.

With a blend of management gameplay, engaging mini-games, and cooperative/competitive multiplayer modes, Supermarket is perfect for friends, families, or anyone looking to build the ultimate shopping empire.

Key Features:

  • Multiplayer Madness: Play solo or with up to 8 players. Collaborate to run a store together or compete head-to-head to see who can dominate the market.

  • Dynamic Management Gameplay: Stock shelves, set prices, hire and train staff, and handle customer requests in real-time.

  • Customizable Stores: Design and decorate your supermarket to suit your style, from product placement to eye-catching decor.

  • Competitive Events: Participate in thrilling challenges like checkout races, flash sales, or customer satisfaction contests to earn rewards and bragging rights.

  • Quirky Customer Personalities: Cater to a diverse cast of shoppers, each with unique needs, quirks, and shopping habits.

  • Seasonal Events: Keep things fresh with limited-time holidays, sales, and themed content updates.

  • Sandbox and Career Modes: Build your dream supermarket at your own pace or tackle the challenges of growing from a corner shop to a retail giant.

Do you have what it takes to keep the aisles running smoothly while delighting customers and outpacing the competition? The doors are open—your supermarket adventure starts now!

name: Supermarket

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Run your dream supermarket! Stock shelves, manage staff, and delight customers in a dynamic, customizable retail empire. Build, expand, and overcome challenges in this fun and engaging management sim.
